__TOC__

The Ubuntu Mentoring Reception holds public meetings, usually on Mondays 15:00 UTC to 16:00 UTC in <code>#ubuntu-meeting</code>. Community is encouraged to attend. This is meant to be discussion of the <nowiki>[[MOTU-Mentoring-Reception|MOTU Mentoring Reception]]</nowiki>.

=== Apologies For Absence ===

* 

=== Items for Discussion ===

Items we will be discussing:
* Review ACTION points from previous sessions.
* Discuss and approve proposed mentoring program documentation -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:showard314]]</nowiki>  * Discuss how to get feedback from relevant teams -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:showard314]]</nowiki>  * Discuss about the completely rename of the team and the mailing list -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:blackz]]</nowiki>  * Discuss with the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~packaging-training-coordinators|packaging training coordinators]]</nowiki> the membership approval for our team -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:blackz]]</nowiki> 
Please feel free to add more items to the agenda for the next meeting. We will discuss them in turn when it arrives.
